entries: Once per turn, when the warrior hits a creature that is its size or smaller with a weapon attack and it has advantage on the roll, it can {@action grapple} the target (escape {@dc 11 + PB}) and move up to 15 feet with it without consuming its movement or provoking oportunity attacks.

While {@condition Grappled|XPHB} in this way, the Grappled creature is also {@condition Silenced|XPHB} and the warrior cannot use this trait against another creature, however, the warrior can use the {@action Hide|XPHB} action with disadvantage, hiding both itself and the Grappled creature on a success.
